1.title: Clip: Cracking New Ground!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

1.plot: Welcome to the start of a brand new season of Minecraft Survival. Let's punch some trees and melt craft some blocks, shall we?

2.title: Clip: The First Mining Expedition!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

2.plot: Let's go get us some valuable resources in the depths of the blocky ground. Coal, iron, and diamonds can all be found within the darkness of caverns and ravines. I wonder what today's mining journey will bring to us.

3.title: Clip: Landscaping Extravaganza!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

3.plot: Our small abode is only going to take us so far - So let's clear some land make room for our giant house of awesomeness. We even start up a little bit of farmland to feed ourselves along the way.

4.title: Clip: Back to the Mine We Go!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

4.plot: We didn't find all that much the first trip down to the darkness - We need as many stacks of everything as possible. We have to do all of that while also not getting killed by creepers and other baddies. Let's hope for the best.

5.title: Clip: Diamonds are Forever!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

5.plot: Our most valuable resource has been bestowed upon us by the bock overlords. Success. Now we can go to the Nether, make a diamond pickaxe, and make some sick armor. Today is a lovely day indeed. Now let's get out of these mines before we die.

6.title: Clip: Let's Build a Big Oak House!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

6.plot: Finally, we build the giant house we rightfully deserve. Gotta put those wooden planks to use somehow right? Remember to make your farm bigger as your house gets bigger. You can never have enough room for wheat and lots of animals.

7.title: Clip: Animal Pens and Even More Building!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

7.plot: Let's just keep doing more of what we did last time.. Those darn Gingerbread Men are always getting in the way - I should put those in a nice ceramic pot or something, or just burn them in some lava. Guess you'll have to keep tuning in to find out.

8.title: Clip: Super Speed Building!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

8.plot: Woah super fast skills dude. Let's finish up a ton more of our giant house and get prepared for a big mining trip.

9.title: Clip: Ravines and Obsidian Galore!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

9.plot: Another successful mining trip is ahead of us in this episode of Minecraft Survival. Now we can go to the Nether and get us some rare goodies.

10.title: Clip: Back to Home Base!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

10.plot: Alright, we got the goods, let's blow this popsicle stand. Building us a Nether portal is our next step toward block greatness. Hopefully we get out of the darkness without being blown to bits.

11.title: Clip: A Frostbitten Nether!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

11.plot: So cool. Like really, really cool. We defeat some intimidating foes and make our way through one of the most dangerous parts of the game.

12.title: Clip: Seasons Greetings Say Goodbye!

episode of.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (TV Series 2016–2017)

12.plot: In our series finale, we speed build more of our ranch. When we come back for next season, we'll put the regular texture pack on and get right back to it. Thanks for tuning in and be sure to come back next time on Minecraft Survival with your host Brick Show Brian.

imdb.title: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian
akas: Clip: Minecraft Survival with Brick Show Brian (United States)
plot: Have a very happy holiday season by tuning in to some Minecraft Survival. Watch Brian as he digs, plants, and builds through twelve whole episodes of Minecraft using the Festive texture pack.
